named-query.name: OtsUsers.findByUserOtsRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM OtsUsers o WHERE o.otsUserRoleId = :otsUserRoleId

named-query.name: OtsUsers.findByRegistrationTable
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM OtsRegistration r,OtsUsers o WHERE o.otsUsersId = :otsUsersMappedTo AND r.otsRegistrationStatus = 'New'

named-query.name: OtsProduct.findByPattrenMatching
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM OtsProduct o WHERE o.otsProductName LIKE :FirstLetter

named-query.name: OtsUsers.findByUserOtsbyMappedTo
named-query.query: select m.otsUsersId from OtsUserMapping m where m.otsMappedTo = :MappedTo

named-query.name: OtsProduct.findByOtsProductIdAndUserId
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM OtsProductStock s WHERE s.otsUsersId = :otsUsersId AND s.otsProductId = :otsProductId

named-query.name: OtsRegistration.matchEmailidPhoneNumber
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM OtsRegistration r WHERE r.otsRegistrationContactNo = :otsRegistrationContactNo OR r.otsRegistrationEmailid = :otsRegistrationEmailid

named-query.name: OtsOrder.fetchOtsSoldProducts
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM OtsOrderProduct o WHERE o.otsOrderId = :otsOrderId AND o.otsProductId= :otsProductId
